diff_hunk:
@@ -144,14 +144,6 @@ def ShouldRunTest(self, run_params):
     # mode, which is a bug. Re-enable this when trt library is fixed.

body: Yes because we updated the test base class to use smaller atol/rtol, and after we fixed the python3 issues in order to make the test pass we need to use (inherit) those atol/rtol, that's why we're deleting this.
